abstract: Judge P Kevin Castel of Federal District Court in Manhattan rules that former New York City councilman Larry B Seabrook, who is serving five-year sentence for corruption, must forfeit his public pension benefits to help pay $418,000 judgment owed to government.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Seabrook must give up his public pension benefits to pay a $418,000 judgment he owes the government as a result of his 2012 conviction on federal corruption charges.

headline.main: Judge Rules Larry Seabrook, Ex-New York Councilman, Must Forfeit His Pension
headline.print_headline: Judge Rules Ex-Politician Must Forfeit His Pension

snippet: Mr. Seabrook must give up his public pension benefits to pay a $418,000 judgment he owes the government as a result of his 2012 conviction on federal corruption charges.
